Key Match Events: The Houston Rockets opened the period with a 17-0 blast to take control of the game.
Edey had a good run in the first half, helping his team to a 65-59 lead before the second half.
Edey bounced back with a better showing on Friday compared to his debut.
Post-Match Reflections: Grizzlies coach Taylor Jenkins opened up about Zach Edey's eagerness to bounce back

Taylor Jenkins said, 'When I went to him yesterday to address the first game, he said, 'Hey, just keep going. I'll get better one day at a time.' I think his head space is in a great spot. He knows he is learning a lot right now.... Things didn't go his way, but he is gonna get better from herein. He understands that.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Memphis Grizzlies were in Houston on Friday to square off against the Rockets.
The Grizzlies looked to get another road win to start the season.
Edey, who struggled in his debut against the Jazz, had a better opening versus the Rockets.
Others: Zach Edey stats against the Houston Rockets on Oct. 25.
The big man returned to play in the second quarter and promptly grabbed an offensive rebound.
He hauled another offensive board a few plays later and scored a bank shot to give the Grizzlies a 57-45 lead with 4:32 to go.
